EmailTemplate.description: R5 - Template for Notification alert when user submit EndUserProject for approval
EmailTemplate.name: EndUserProject Approval Req Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: EndUserProject {!End_User_Project__c.Name} Pending for Approval
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear Approver, An End User Project is pending for your approval. Please click on the link below to view the details of this End user project, where the complete approval history can be found. Link to End user project: {!End_User_Project__c.Name} Best Regards, Your Salesforce Team *** This is an automatically generated email, please do not reply ***
